items.title: 'He knows what he wants' - Chalobah on new manager Rosenior
items.summary: Chelsea defender Trevoh Chalobah says new manager Liam Rosenior has asked the squad to "trust in themselves" and to "rely on each other" following his appointment at Stamford Bridge.

items.title: Troublesome 16-pin connector sidelines $30,000 H200 Hopper GPU â€” repair technician saves the data center day by fixing power port
items.summary: Technician repairs 16-pin power connector on a $30,000 H200 PCIe Hopper graphics card. Connector's sense pins were damaged and had to be fixed by soldering new pins to the card.

items.title: 'Nearly severed my spine' - Olympic hopeful's journey back to judo
items.summary: One-time Olympic judo hopeful Eric Ham says he refused to give up on his sporting career after fracturing his back falling from a bridge.

items.summary: Indian online retailer Flipkart teased a new Realme P-Series smartphone yesterday, which was believed to be the P4 Power with a 10,001 mAh battery. Today, Realme confirmed that this upcoming P-Series smartphone is the P4 Power without revealing its launch date. While Realme hasn't detailed the P4 Pâ€¦

items.title: Weekly sports quiz: Which football club's stadium turned the sky pink?
items.summary: How much attention have you paid to what's happened in the world of sport over the past seven days?

items.title: Wikipedia turns 25 and shares a glimpse into the lives of its volunteer editors
items.summary: It's been 25 years since the launch of Wikipedia on January 15th, 2001, and it's come a long way from housing just 100 pages to becoming a behemoth of online knowledge with more than 65 million articles that get almost 15 billion views each month. To celebrate, the Wikimedia Foundation - the nonproâ€¦

items.title: Microsoft, Meta, and Amazon are paying up for ‘enterprise’ access to Wikipedia
items.summary: Microsoft, Meta, Amazon, Perplexity, and Mistral AI have joined Google in paying the Wikimedia Foundation for access to its projects, including Wikipedia's vast collection of articles. The Wikimedia Foundation announced the news as part of Wikipedia's 25th anniversary on Thursday. The partnerships â€¦

items.title: 'Completely incapacitated' Olympian targets Worlds return
items.summary: Olympic windsurfer Sam Sills outlines his recovery from a debilitating freak injury that left him struggling to walk.

items.title: iPhone Fold may use a liquid metal hinge, new leak suggests
items.summary: The first foldable from Apple, tentatively called the iPhone Fold, is rumored to launch later this year alongside the iPhone 18 Pro series. A new leak now sheds light on its construction and the materials Apple may be using. According to the leak, Appleâ€™s foldable iPhone will use a hinge crafted frâ€¦

items.title: WSL players make confessions including Toone, Shaw and Kelly
items.summary: The best moments from BBC Sportâ€™s Confession Cam featuring WSL stars Khadija Shaw, Ella Toone, Chloe Kelly and more.

items.title: Raducanu given potential Sabalenka obstacle in Melbourne
items.summary: Emma Raducanu is handed a potential third-round match against world number one Aryna Sabalenka at the Australian Open.

items.title: Scarlets want Wales' Hawkins to settle at centre
items.summary: Scarlets intend to allow Wales centre Joe Hawkins to focus on his midfield role after the return from injury of Sam Costelow.

items.title: GB's Fery qualifies for first overseas Grand Slam
items.summary: Britain's Arthur Fery qualifies for his first overseas Grand Slam by beating Dino Prizmic to reach the Australian Open main draw.

items.title: What does xG predict for the rest of the season?
items.summary: With more than half the season gone, we have enough stats to get a good idea of how well Premier League teams have been playing and therefore how things are likely to unfold in the months ahead.

items.title: Realme Neo8 showcased in all three colorways
items.summary: Realme is unveiling the Neo8 on January 22, and ahead of that, the company is showing it in all three colorways in which it will be sold. These roughly translate from Chinese as Cyber Purple, Mecha Grey, and Origin White. Realme Neo8 official images Realme has already confirmed that the Neo8 will bâ€¦

items.title: Google Pixel 10a price leaks along with its release date
items.summary: There's been a lot of news about the Google Pixel 10a in the past couple of days or so. First, its colorways leaked along with a rough release timeframe, then a purported official image leaked. Now a new rumor from a tipster on X claims to have pricing information and an exact release date: Februarâ€¦

items.title: Google launches Personal Intelligence for Gemini
items.summary: Google today introduced Personal Intelligence for Gemini. This is an opt-in feature. If you turn it on, it securely connects information from apps like Gmail, YouTube, Google Search, and Google Photos, which Gemini can then use in its conversations with you. This is rolling out over the next week tâ€¦

items.title: Hearts 'underdogs by long shot' but still setting Premiership pace
items.summary: If it seemed Hearts made a statement by winning with 10 men at Dundee on Sunday, they upped the ante against St Mirren four days later.

items.title: Samsung Internet for Windows is now widely available, no more restrictions
items.summary: Back in October, Samsung launched its web browser called Internet on Windows. This was a pretty important development, as Samsung Internet had before that point been relegated to Android devices. Samsung Internet for Windows was a beta release and only available in Korea and the US. That changes toâ€¦

items.title: 'Cut me a little bit of slack' - O'Neill calls for patience on Celtic transfers
items.summary: The Celtic manager Martin O'Neill says "cut me a little bit of slack" as the club work on bringing in new faces this month.

items.title: Sanchez mistakes 'on me' - Rosenior defends Chelsea keeper
items.summary: Chelsea boss Liam Rosenior defends goalkeeper Robert Sanchez following two mistakes in his side's 3-2 defeat at home to Arsenal on Wednesday in their Carabao Cup semi-final first-leg tie.
